mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT b.XM, b.RYBH, b.ZJHM, b.ZJZLID, b.XBID, b.HJDXZ, b.LRRQ, a.AJBH FROM T_RY_WFFZRYXX b, T_AJ_XZAJRYDY a where a.RYBH = b.RYBH and a.RYLX = '04' and b.LRDWID like '110105%' /*and b.LRDWID like '110227%'*/
and b.LRRQ > to_date(#{LRRQMAX} , 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')

SELECT DISTINCT b.XM, b.RYBH, b.ZJHM, b.ZJZLID, b.XBID, b.HJDXZ, b.LRRQ, a.AJBH FROM T_RY_WFFZRYXX b,T_AJ_XSAJRYDY a where a.RYBH = b.RYBH and a.RYLX = '04' and b.LRDWID like '110105%' /*and b.LRDWID like '110227%'*/
and b.LRRQ > to_date(#{LRRQMAX} , 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')

SELECT RYID,CLJD,ORGID,PZR,PZSJ,RYBH,PZSJ CZSJ,ID FROM T_RY_RYCLXX where ORGID like '110105%'
and PZSJ > to_date(#{pzsj} , 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
